name: Magic Flying Space Tiger
description:
Created in 10 days for Tiger(J)am 3

With the theme "Everythings is backwards" and a limited color pallette of 5 colors.

If you're subject to photo-sensitivity, you can disable blinking in the options.

Known bug on WebGL :

- The joystick axys seems to be inverted in some cases on the web version. If you wish to play with a gamepad/controller please download the windows version. 

Credits Art / Animation / Development

Szym
